body: Index based cursor move and delete swipe fallback for indexless inputs

Ability to hide launcher icon removed (Android 10 policy).
Use a custom launcher that support icon hiding instead.
Back button fix for old Androids

Custom navigation bar color (experimental, Android 9+ only)
Refactored launcher activity
Don't show language on spacebar if only one is selected
Delete swipe. Better space swipe sensitivity.
Option to disable swipe. Lower initial sensitivity.
